definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a card with one or more rectangular openings or apertures holding frames of microfilm.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a card with one or more rectangular openings or apertures holding frames of microfilm.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a loop of flexible plastic or magnetic film on which audio signals are mechanically recorded, commonly known under the trade name Dictabelt.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a loop of flexible plastic or magnetic film on which audio signals are mechanically recorded, commonly known under the trade name Dictabelt.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing an audio tape.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing an audio tape.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a roller-shaped object on which sound waves are incised or indented in a continuous circular groove.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a roller-shaped object on which sound waves are incised or indented in a continuous circular groove.
scope note[0]_en: Wax cylinders, wire cylinders, etc., are included.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc on which sound waves, recorded as modulations, pulses, etc., are incised or indented in a continuous spiral groove.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc on which sound waves, recorded as modulations, pulses, etc., are incised or indented in a continuous spiral groove.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a roll of paper on which musical notes are represented by perforations, designed to mechanically reproduce the music when used in a player piano, player organ, etc.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a roll of paper on which musical notes are represented by perforations, designed to mechanically reproduce the music when used in a player piano, player organ, etc.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a reel or spool of steel or stainless steel wire upon which audio signals are magnetically recorded.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a reel or spool of steel or stainless steel wire upon which audio signals are magnetically recorded.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing an audiotape.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing an audiotape.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of audiotape to be used with reel-to-reel audio equipment.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of audiotape to be used with reel-to-reel audio equipment.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of opaque material.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of opaque material.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a card containing digitally encoded data designed for use with a computer.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a card containing digitally encoded data designed for use with a computer.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a miniaturized electronic circuit on a small wafer of semiconductor silicon, designed to provide additional processing, memory, or storage capacity.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a miniaturized electronic circuit on a small wafer of semiconductor silicon, designed to provide additional processing, memory, or storage capacity.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc containing digitally encoded data that are magnetically or optically recorded.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc containing digitally encoded data that are magnetically or optically recorded.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing one or more computer discs.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing one or more computer discs.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a computer tape.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a computer tape.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a computer tape.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a computer tape.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of computer tape to be used with a computer tape drive.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of computer tape to be used with a computer tape drive.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a motion picture film.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a motion picture film.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a motion picture film.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a motion picture film.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a motion picture film to be used with a motion picture film projector.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a motion picture film to be used with a motion picture film projector.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of film.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of film.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a short strip of film, usually in rigid format rather than rolled.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a short strip of film, usually in rigid format rather than rolled.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a roll of film, with or without recorded sound, containing a succession of images intended for projection one at a time.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a roll of film, with or without recorded sound, containing a succession of images intended for projection one at a time.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a filmstrip.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a filmstrip.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a hinging device holding two or more sheets designed for use on an easel.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a hinging device holding two or more sheets designed for use on an easel.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a sheet of film bearing a number of micro-images in a two-dimensional array.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a sheet of film bearing a number of micro-images in a two-dimensional array.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing uncut microfiches.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing uncut microfiches.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a microfilm.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a microfilm.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a microfilm.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a microfilm.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a microfilm, to be threaded into a microfilm reader.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a microfilm, to be threaded into a microfilm reader.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of microfilm.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of microfilm.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a short strip of microfilm cut from a roll.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a short strip of microfilm cut from a roll.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a card or sheet of opaque material bearing a number of micro-images in a two-dimensional array.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a card or sheet of opaque material bearing a number of micro-images in a two-dimensional array.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of transparent material, with or without a protective mount, bearing a minute object designed for use with a device such as a microscope.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of transparent material, with or without a protective mount, bearing a minute object designed for use with a device such as a microscope.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a three-dimensional artifact, a replica of an artifact, or a naturally-occurring object.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a three-dimensional artifact, a replica of an artifact, or a naturally-occurring object.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a digital resource accessed by means of hardware and software connections to a communications network.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a digital resource accessed by means of hardware and software connections to a communications network.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a sheet of transparent material, with or without a protective mount, bearing an image designed for use with an overhead projector.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a sheet of transparent material, with or without a protective mount, bearing an image designed for use with an overhead projector.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of paper, film, tape, etc.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of paper, film, tape, etc.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a flat, thin piece of paper, plastic, etc.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a flat, thin piece of paper, plastic, etc.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of transparent material, usually in a protective mount, bearing an image designed for use with a slide projector or viewer.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of transparent material, usually in a protective mount, bearing an image designed for use with a slide projector or viewer.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of film on which sound is recorded.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of film on which sound is recorded.
scope note[0]_en: Use for sound-track films, whether or not they are intended to accompany visual images on film.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a card bearing stereographic images.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a card bearing stereographic images.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc with openings around the perimeter holding pairs of still images designed for use with a stereograph viewer.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc with openings around the perimeter holding pairs of still images designed for use with a stereograph viewer.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a video tape.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a video tape.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a video tape.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a video tape.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc on which video signals, with or without sound, are recorded.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of a disc on which video signals, with or without sound, are recorded.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a video tape for use with reel-to-reel video equipment.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a video tape for use with reel-to-reel video equipment.

definition[0]_en: A carrier type that consists of one or more sheets bound or fastened together to form a single unit.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A carrier type that consists of one or more sheets bound or fastened together to form a single unit.
